subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The high-scoring Stars, who will play the three metropolitan area N.H.L. teams in the next four days, have dropped their goals-allowed average to 2.46 a game from 3.13 last season.
snippet: The high-scoring Stars, who will play the three metropolitan area N.H.L. teams in the next four days, have dropped their goals-allowed average to 2.46 a game from 3.13 last season.
